name: Blimps PC/MAC free game demo
description:
You are the captain of your own Blimp. Armed with Water, Fire, and Ice canons, and a couple of Hanger Robots to help you on your way. Safely deliver cargo to trading posts—pirate loot from other Blimps. Can you learn to make it in this world of Blimps only to escape it?

Exploring, collecting, crafting, smuggling, secret codes, and racing abound in this adventure puzzle game. It's eccentric, quirky, weird, and challenging to complete. 

It also features an indie surf rock opera as its musical backdrop performed by the band Ashtronautband.com. No ads, no in-app purchases, no data collection. Just an old-school computer game. We hope you enjoy the game, thanks for playing!

-Ed (co-creator/developer of Blimps)

PS. The game is rated ages 4+ for Everyone

PLEASE NOTE: This is the free demo MAC/PC version of Blimps, the game is fully functional for 13 minutes until the time-bomb dynamite goes off and your Blimp company’s game resets and restarts. The full paid version is available in the app stores and Steam.
